ai-tha-ap508:0.3_0: for the Elder Māluṅkyaputta’s Fruit of the World,
ai-tha-ap508:1.2_0: like the moon in the waxing fortnight.
ai-tha-ap508:1.4_0: I saw the benefit of the world,
ai-tha-ap508:2.3_0: are worthy of a religious donation.
ai-tha-ap508:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap508:5.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap508:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Māluṅkyaputta.
ai-tha-ap508:8.1_0: for the sixth months of Māluṅkyaputta, the Elder Nun Māluṅkyaputta,
